title: Persona
subtitle: The Mask Series
description: Steel constructs exploring identity, duality, and the interface between outward presentation and inward essence.

works.title: Persona
works.description: Examining identity through its ancient roots (Latin: mask). A steel construct serving as both armor and expression.

works.title: Vitreolum
works.description: The face emerges from a web of iron bars... Perhaps every identity is a cage, forged from inherited bars of lineage.

works.title: The Relic
works.description: A face that occupies space yet allows us to see through it. Tradition as a vast latticework of fragments.

works.title: The Last Iron Maiden
works.description: The culminating work. Thousands of heavy steel rods welded into a single, breathing visage.

works.title: Iron Maiden
works.description: A wall relief blurring painting and sculpture. Achieved 712,000 EUR at auction.

works.title: Madonna and the Veil
works.description: Instead of a perfect portrayal, a veil where the visage would be. Absence becomes the locus of presence.

title: Elemental
subtitle: Amphoras & Drops
description: Vessels and forms that explore the fundamental substances of life: water, oil, and the earth.

works.title: Waterdrop
works.description: A glowing ripple frozen in time. 20,000 welded bars finished in high-gloss patina.

works.title: Oildrop & Ripple
works.description: Diptych. Oildrop: burned with mechanical oil (earth). Ripple: high-gloss polish (water).

works.title: Triptych of Amphoras
works.description: Relic (earth/rust), Water (transparency/light), Oleum (sacred oil/black).

works.title: Amphora Oleum
works.description: Burnt steel coaxing emerald greens and violet iridescence.

title: Sumerian
subtitle: Script & Fragments
description: Contemporary translations of the world's earliest script, rendered in steel lattices.

works.title: Sumerian Cuneiform
works.description: Airy lattices where every rod operates like a stylus mark.

works.title: Sumerian Moon
works.description: A perfect sphere encased in a sharp, angular skin of cuneiform script.

title: Nature
subtitle: Flora & Landscape
description: Organic forms reimagined through industrial precision.

works.title: The Dandelion
works.description: Mirrored steel. A quiet philosopher of the ruins.

works.title: The "After" Dandelion
works.description: A dialogue between a stainless steel "ideal" and a rusted Corten "survivor".

works.title: Amazona
works.description: Fragments series. Double arc suggesting riverbanks.

title: Portraits
subtitle: Bronze Busts
description: Disciplined realism capturing the "second portrait"—the private pulse behind the public face.

works.title: Dr. Franjo Tuđman
works.description: A series of 7 busts charting Croatia's transition.

works.title: J.R.R. Tolkien
works.description: Coded tribute with "1973" hidden in book spines. Installed in Oxford.

works.title: Hypatia of Alexandria
works.description: A fractured bust repaired with visible "scars" of gold/bronze.

works.title: Nietzsche and Zarathustra
works.description: A dialogue between the tense philosopher and his serene ideal.

title: Numismatics
subtitle: Coins & Medals
description: Masterful hand-engraving for the Croatian National Bank and ECB.

works.title: Euro Coins
works.description: Official Croatian Euro coinage. Two-layer design: motifs (Tesla, Marten) emerging from the national checkerboard.

works.title: King Tomislav
works.description: Bi-metallic gold and silver. Micro-engraved profile and olive tree reverse.

works.title: Dalmatian Dog
works.description: Spots rendered as the silhouettes of Dalmatian islands.

works.title: Croatian Black Lizard
works.description: Deep black patina mirroring volcanic soil.
